dribbling.name: Dribbling Drill
dribbling.description: Improve dribbling skills by navigating through cones.

passing.name: Passing Drill
passing.description: Enhance passing accuracy and technique with a partner.

shooting.name: Shooting Drill
shooting.description: Practice shooting on target from various positions.

crossing.name: Crossing Drill
crossing.description: Improve crossing accuracy by delivering balls into the box.

defensive.name: Defensive Drill
defensive.description: Develop defensive skills such as marking and tackling.

juggling.name: Juggling Drill
juggling.description: Enhance ball control and coordination by juggling the ball with different body parts.

one-on-one.name: One-on-One Drill
one-on-one.description: Improve dribbling, decision-making, and attacking skills in a one-on-one situation.

heading.name: Heading Drill
heading.description: Practice heading the ball accurately and with power.

speed-and-agility.name: Speed and Agility Drill
speed-and-agility.description: Enhance speed, agility, and quickness with ladder drills and cone exercises.

small-sided-game.name: Small-Sided Game
small-sided-game.description: Engage in a small-sided game to improve teamwork, decision-making, and overall game understanding.

agility-ladder.name: Agility Ladder Drill
agility-ladder.description: Improve footwork and coordination with an agility ladder.

pass-and-move.name: Pass and Move Drill
pass-and-move.description: Enhance passing accuracy and movement off the ball.

cone-dribbling.name: Cone Dribbling Drill
cone-dribbling.description: Improve close ball control and dribbling skills around cones.

wall-passing.name: Wall Passing Drill
wall-passing.description: Practice passing and receiving using a wall as a teammate.

speed-sprint.name: Speed Sprint Drill
speed-sprint.description: Improve acceleration and speed with short distance sprints.
